text:
[Verse]
Wake up morning light
The world so fresh bright
Feel the love tonight
Everything's alright

[Verse 2]
Walking down the lane
No more tears no pain
Sunshine after rain
Dancing like insane

[Chorus]
Oh oh sunshine days
Oh oh different ways
Bringing endless rays
Golden summer haze

[Verse 3]
Feel the breeze so warm
No more storm to swarm
Nature’s sweet reform
Heart in perfect form

[Bridge]
Running through the fields
Joy that laughter yields
Magic oh it feels
Colors life reveals

[Chorus]
Oh oh sunshine days
Oh oh different ways
Bringing endless rays
Golden summer haze
title: Sunshine Days
